---
category: news
title: "Humboldt Professorship for artificial intelligence for Bielefeld University"
excerpt: "Bielefeld University has been awarded its second Alexander von Humboldt Professorship. This time, it goes to the computer scientist Professor Dr. Yaochu Jin. He is one of the world's leading experts on evolutionary algorithms -- a form of artificial intelligence (AI) that optimizes its own capabilities."
